summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 26th Ave. West from West Dravus Street to West Grover Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 18129 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment of Bonds."
